DataElement.preferredName: Product Problem Discover Performed Observation Outcome Data ISO21090.ANY.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The recognition of a product defect that needs to be reported. EXAMPLE(S): An imaging device is discovered to be leaking radiation. This was discovered on Jan. 10th, but it suspected to have been leaking for a week. Data or information that is determined by an act of observation. EXAMPLE(S): The result of a lab test, physical finding, self-reported symptom. The adverse event term code.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Problem Discover Performed Observation Outcome Data
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.:See for the first time; identify.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
